title: Globle
description: A geography game. Try to figure out the mystery country in as few guesses as possible!

title: Plurality
description: A Web3 guessing game. How well do you know the most common opinions on the internet?

title: Genitle
description: The classic daily guessing game with a sex-ed theme! Made to promote sexual literacy, as well as the film A Sexplanation.

title: Motzash
description: A is your dashboard companion for Jewish holidays with practical widgets and a social network.

title: Spotify Prewrapped
description: A web app for Spotify users. Don't wait until the end of the year for insights into your favourite tracks and artists!

title: Dynamic Gradients
description: A tool for web developers. Use dials and switches to design and export dynamic gradients in CSS!
